name: Monster Jam
summary: Experience extreme monster truck action as you catch massive air, crush cars, perform crazy stunts, destroy everything in your path, race to the finish line and more. Battle through stadium races, freestyle competitions and outdoor circuit tracks on your way to becoming the Monster Jam world champion!
info:
• 中文名: 怪兽卡车
  • 游戏类型: Racing
  • 发行日期: 05-30-2008
  • 售价: 49.99 USD
  • 发行公司: Activision
  • 制作公司: Torus Games
